Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all interactions with the GangWeb database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseHandler()
      Creates an instance of DatabaseHandler with an initialized connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AddElement(Person person)
      Adds a new individual to the database
      void Disconnect()
      Terminates the connection with the GangWeb database.
      void generateData(int i)
      Generates random identities and adds them to the database.
      void RemoveElement(java.lang.Integer id)
      Removes the specified individual from the database
      Person[] Search(Person person)
      Searches the database on the specified criteria.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseHandler

        public DatabaseHandler()
        Creates an instance of DatabaseHandler with an initialized connection.

    • Method Detail

      • Disconnect

        public void Disconnect()
        Terminates the connection with the GangWeb database.

      • Search

        public Person[] Search(Person person)
        Searches the database on the specified criteria. If you do not wish to search for a specified attribute enter null.
        Parameters:
        person - Specifies which attributes to search on
        Returns:
        An array of people who fit the search criteria.

      • AddElement

        public void AddElement(Person person)
        Adds a new individual to the database
        Parameters:
        person - The person to be added to the database

      • RemoveElement

        public void RemoveElement(java.lang.Integer id)
        Removes the specified individual from the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the element to be removed

      • generateData

        public void generateData(int i)
        Generates random identities and adds them to the database.
        Parameters:
        i - The number of people to be created and added to the database
